name: Pop the bubbles!
description:
Instructions
  • Click to move the player. 
  • Pop the bubbles. 
  • Get the high score.
  • If you pop all the bubbles,  you get a new wave of bubbles.
Process

The game was built during the 2020 Zero Hour Game Jam.  It was built in 0h. Production time was about 58 minutes. Two fixes was added after the deadline (as allowed by the rules) one reset bug and one anchor point.

Theme was spiky. So a spiky star must pop bubbles to get points.

Spent about an hour after the submission getting the WebGL build to work.  I had to rollback to unity 2019 for the build.
